trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGNOR4PLAENNI_00600_TYRNEE_000_000<tab>Y-You wish to ask me questions? I should be glad to tell you what I know! As for a fitting payment... Ah, yes─I ask that you listen to me!
TEXT_REGNOR4PLAENNI_00600_TYRNEE_000_100<tab>I'm just a Nu Mou like any other. I offer my services to those in need in return for a fitting payment.
TEXT_REGNOR4PLAENNI_00600_TYRNEE_000_101<tab>Though if you ask the others, I'm terrible at setting prices. They say I ask for too little in return.
TEXT_REGNOR4PLAENNI_00600_TYRNEE_000_102<tab>To that I say to each their own. As long as one is satisfied, then a fitting payment has been rendered, don't you agree?

TEXT_REGNOR4PLAENNI_00600_TYRNEE_000_200<tab>This cave is called Pla Enni, and our people have called it home for generations. To the pixies, it's a dank and dark and dreary place, but this is precisely the way we Nu Mou like it.

TEXT_REGNOR4PLAENNI_00600_TYRNEE_000_201<tab>Lest you wonder, Pla Enni is the name of a variety of mushroom that's central to our lives. We make our homes out of them, and use their spores to prepare our magical concoctions.

TEXT_REGNOR4PLAENNI_00600_TYRNEE_000_202<tab>Alas, with the men of Voeburt long departed, few come seeking our concoctions these days, leaving us starved of the patronage we crave. <sigh> Such a trying time this is...
